comments.comment:
Excellently said bro. We as real muslims should live with all nations in peace and unity. We should stand as one to stop any extremist, racist  and terrorists. Lets join hands together to protect and save  our mother Lanka from getting destroyed any further.

Also a kind reminder to all my muslim brothers and sisters. Pls dont go beyond limits and practice our true religion. It might bring fear to other people who would make to think islam is terrorism. My humble request is pls try to Do ur Farl (obligatory) duties as much as possible and lets live according to the rules in this  Buddist nations' country. It will benifit us and our children in future. We do not want to follow the rules in saudi as its not the coyntry we live. Even islam says abide by the rules and laws in the country u live in. 

So pls my dear brothers and sisters its high time for us to think more wisely than ever before with our minds and rebuild the broken trust within the brotherhood of mother Lanka.
We love you mother Lanka.
Salams to all.
Ayubowewa!!!
comments.author: azan jainudeen

comments.comment:
Dear Brother,
What you said is 100% Correct. At this situation we need quick understanding. We Sinhala,Tamil, Muslim & Christians are brothers and sisters of our Sri Lanka. There is no difference. This terrorist don't have religion. So please tell our brothers and sisters to think before saying anything. We together can succeed the situation. There are group who are trying to take the picture to different directions. Try to advice them be patient to sort out the problem systematically without bring our economy down. Fighting is the easiest thing can happen but knowledgeable person will use his brain instead to solve the issue. That is what we need now. Let's hold the hands to gether to bring our country back to good position. We all say with one voice no for terrorist.
